title:
Terminal singularities of the moduli space of curves on low degree
  hypersurfaces and the circle method
abstract:
We study the singularities of the moduli space of degree $e$ maps from smooth
genus $g$ curves to an arbitrary smooth hypersurface of low degree. For $e$
large compared to $g$, we show that these moduli spaces have at worst terminal
singularities. Our main approach is to study the jet schemes of these moduli
spaces by developing a suitable form of the circle method.
